about_the_game:
Control your camera and get the perfect view with View & Slew! Developed by FS-FlightControl, View & Slew gives you full access to camera and aircraft slow functionality. It allows you to accurately move, zoom, and tilt your camera to any position. You can also enable and maneuver your aircraft in slew mode.

Once installed and downloaded, View & Slew will launch automatically once you open Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition.

Features:

A full range of camera controls:

  • Total control of the camera position
  • The ability to tilt on all sides
  • Zoom functionality
  • Quickly reset the view or go back to the cockpit with just one click!

Comprehensive slew mode:

  • Move the aircraft in all directions
  • Rotate the aircraft freely around all axes

A detailed manual is also included and can be accessed via the ‘?’ within the tool. Please note you will need to be connected to the internet to access this feature.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.
